Question: Between 1868 and 1869, this person gave a series of "farewell readings" in England, Scotland, and Ireland, beginning on 6 October.
Hints: This person's younger brother Frederick and Catherine's 17-year-old sister Mary moved in with them.
As a child, this person had walked past the house and dreamed of living in it.
Charles John Huffam **** (pron.: /?t??rlz ?d?k?nz/; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870) was an English writer and social critic.
